body_html: Oh that's great - I would definitely support having that config parameter getting passed to the appropriate functions. Alternatively, we can add a new param to RunConfig called something like "loss_logging_steps"
body_text: Oh that's great - I would definitely support having that config parameter getting passed to the appropriate functions. Alternatively, we can add a new param to RunConfig called something like "loss_logging_steps"
body: Oh that's great - I would definitely support having that config parameter getting passed to the appropriate functions. Alternatively, we can add a new param to RunConfig called something like "loss_logging_steps"
